pageProduct.name: VitalStrength Biolic5 Recovery Once a day Formula Orange Boost 440g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vital Strength’s Biolic5 Recovery is your all-in-one complete daily muscle recovery stack. Specially formulated with five key recovery ingredients: Glutamine, Taurine, Creatine, aminos plus 21 Vitamins and Minerals to support muscle growth & repair.

Zero stimulants mean you can take Bioloc5 Recovery any time of the day to reduce post-workout soreness & fatigue and prevent the breakdown of muscle tissue.

• Formulated using five key recovery ingredients: Glutamine, Taurine, Creatine, Aminos plus 21 Vitamins and Minerals.
• 3g of Creatine for increased energy production.
• 21 added vitamins & minerals.
• Supports recovery with 600mg of Taurine
• Boosted 1.9g L-glutamine  for cortisol suppression.
• Complex amino acid profile to prevent breakdown of muscles & promote growth after training.
• Zero stimulants- ideal for use at any time of day.

Warnings

This product should be used in conjunction with an appropriate physical training or exercise program. This product is not intended as a sole source of nutrition and should be consumed in conjunction with a nutritious diet and appropriate fluid intake. Not suitable for children under 15 years or pregnant women: should be used under medical or dietetic supervision. Exceeding the recommended serving size may cause harm due to the high level of vitamins and minerals.

Common Uses

Take Biolic5 Recovery daily to promote muscular repair, prevent soreness & delay fatigue.

Ingredients

Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Flavour, Colour (110), Sucralose (955). Made in Australia from local and imported ingredients.

Directions

Mix 11g (approx. 1 level scoop) into 250-300ml of cold water and stir until dissolved. Best taken once daily.
